name: Wechselberger Johanna
description:
Your holiday accommodation
-	in both summer and winter - quiet, sunny location on the outskirts of Hippach.
Our holiday apartments for 2-6 persons are comfortably furnished and feature one or two bedrooms, lounge with Sat-TV, kitchen, bathroom, separate WC, entrance hall and balcony. Furthermore, house guests benefit from a ski room with boot dryer, ample parking space as well as a bread delivery service for breakfast.
Ski and hiker’s bus stop, the Penken, Ahorn and Horberg cable cars, tennis courts, children’s playground, riding stables, mini-golf and three via Ferrate climbing routes are all close by and easily accessible.
A cross country ski trail leads right past the house.
Our guests enjoy free admission to the adventure swimming pools in Hippach and Mayrhofen as well as free use of the tennis courts.
Younger guests will have fun discovering the play tower with swing, slide, climbing wall and sand pit in the garden. 

Our tap water is energised according to original Grander technology. 
We look forward to meeting you soon, 
-	Family Johanna Wechselberger
Free entrance in the fun outdoor swimming pool schwendau,
Bread roll service
Check-In : 14.00
Check-Out:  09.00
